extendedInfo.description: CouchSurfing is the worldâs largest social travel network, connecting a global community of travelers, adventure seekers, and lifelong learners. Members get together to share meals, places to stay, parties, and anything else they can think of! CouchSurfing helps you get offline and connected to other open, fun people, wherever you are. In the app, you can: - Search for people to connect with - Respond to and send CouchRequests - Have conversations with upcoming hosts and surfers - Easily view peopleâs profiles- Facebook loginHappy Surfing! - New to CouchSurfing? Join us on the web: http://www.couchsurfing.com More ways to stay connected: Follow us on Twitter @CouchSurfing Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/couchsurfing

reviews.title: Of little use right now (missing features)
reviews.comment: The app had a great feeling to it but seriously guys, why make an app that can\'t -edit you couch status -write references . -send messages  Please add these features. You\'ll make thousands of people happy!
reviews.author: Ilan Karibou

reviews.title: Great but Limited
reviews.comment: So far it\'s a brilliantly written app, but it has a long way to go before being truly useful. Could do with the ability to edit your own profile!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What\'s the point?
reviews.comment: Barely any features. Especially missing features like messaging and groups. If you want to get meet up info from a group or message you can\'t. What other reason would you use the app for? Useless.
reviews.author: Aaron Neilson-Belman

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: There is no way to able to read and send messages on the app. If i have to login on web site every time when i want to read my messages, why should i use this app? App doesnt show pictures of people most of the time. Need heavy improvement
reviews.author: Serkan B

reviews.title: Nice to have, but not for travelers yet
reviews.comment: Well, here\'s hoping for an update before I travel next, because this app on my new tablet isn\'t going to be replacing using the web. Search filters are key before it\'s a useful app for me, can\'t find hosts like this. You guys want some help? I know the are a bunch of us who would pitch in to develop this if there was a way. Let\'s crowd source this thing and make it awesome!  Still glad to have this app, though. Great way to respond to requests :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still not very functionall
reviews.comment: Theres no messages system, no searching by the map, no searching by couch for more than one person, no access to groups, no giving refferences. It\'s just a tiny addition to the website. For the money community donates to the corporation it could be done much better. But at least it is some effort.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not display properly on galaxy tablet
reviews.comment: When running the app the display is huge like I am zoomed in. Have tried to find ways to adjust display setting but cant seem to make this app function correctly on my samsung galaxy 10.1 tablet.
reviews.author: Jeff Miller

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: Great work in progress. This app needs better search (last online etc), result sorting, groups, option to send a message or leave a reference. Add these things and it will be a perfect replacement for the website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: What\'s the point of this app again? It is completely worthless and doesn\'t compare to the regular website. The mobile site is extremely buggy as well. Hopefully CS will soon join the 21st century
reviews.author: Jacques Benhayoun

reviews.title: Getting better..
reviews.comment: Nice UI! Still lacks profile editing. Would be great to be able to filter surfers by couch availability!
reviews.author: Maxime Schmitt

reviews.title: Almost useless
reviews.comment: It lacks many features of the desktop version, such as messaging between people, for meeting.
reviews.author: Marinos Georgiades

reviews.title: Useless, No Bug Update
reviews.comment: This app keeps on telling me that my username and password dont match. Even after I reset my password, it keeps telling me the same thing.
reviews.author: Glenn Bolang

reviews.title: Great start, long way to go
reviews.comment: Great start, but still hasn\'t fulfilled its promise. Missing a huge number of logical features (ie notifications when you get a couch request), and for some reason makes me sign in every time I open the app , which makes background sync impossible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless, what a shame
reviews.comment: This is what $15 million investment buys? CS now reeks of incompetence on so many levels. Cant edit profiles, can\'t recieve messages, CS has SOLD OUT
reviews.author: Alex Box

reviews.title: Worst ever!
reviews.comment: I can only see messages of couch request. What about the other messages? Forum?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love CS but app needs improvement
reviews.comment: Team you are doing a wonderful job in general - please make the app being able to send and receive regular messages, thank you!
reviews.author: Louis Dansereau

reviews.title: Great ux and ui but no feature
reviews.comment: Please improve the filters for hosts. You can\'t really specify the couch. It takes 7 clicks to find out that a host only accepts one surfer but you are two. Great tec work but could need some more feature. Just keep on going and listen of feedback.
reviews.author: Johannes Hoppe

reviews.title: No messages?
reviews.comment: Why do only couch request messages appear? I need both my inbox mesages and requests to surf. When youre on your browser sending the request seems less natural than a message, so I have all my info in the messaging inbox.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very useful.
reviews.comment: Not very useful to me. I would use a mobile app to check couch requests and communicate with my local group. But these options aren\'t available. Hopefully a functional app will eventually be available.
reviews.author: Gary Bogue

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Fast and good for couch requests but no msgs and groups so...
reviews.author: Eyal Shaich
